publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2268 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 2 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the Title Conditions (Scotland) Act 2003 (Notice of Potential Liability for Costs) Amendment Order 2004 (SSI 2004/552).
